GraphDisplay

public GraphDisplay(prefuse.data.Graph p_graph,
                    boolean p_distancefilter)
Creates a new instance of GraphDisplay

Parameters:
p_graph - The Prefuse Graph to be displayed.
p_distancefilter - A boolean, indicating whether or not a GraphDistance filter should be used with this display.
